name: Pumpkin Maze (geomagas)
description:
This game was made for the One Minute Game jam #8.

The goal is to navigate the pumpkin through a randomly-generated maze in 60 seconds or less.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, [ESC] to main menu

Credits:

Pumpkin: PumpO!

Finish flag: from Pixel Adventure

Soundtrack: Royalty Free Music Pack

Font: Peralta
